Delete:
always @(posedge clk) begin
  if(reset) begin
    beat_cnt_frame <= {BEATS_PER_FRAME_WIDTH{1'b0}};
  end else begin
    if(beat_cnt_frame == cfg_beats_per_frame) begin
      beat_cnt_frame <= beat_cnt_frame + 1'b1;
end
Add:
always @(posedge clk) begin
    if(reset) begin
      if(beat_cnt_frame == cfg_beats_per_frame) begin
        beat_cnt_frame <= {BEATS_PER_FRAME_WIDTH{1'b0}};
      end else begin
        beat_cnt_frame <= beat_cnt_frame + 1'b1;
      end
